snippet.title: Pax Dei | Official announcement
snippet.description:
Discover Pax Dei—a vast, social sandbox MMO inspired by the legends of the medieval era, with community and emergent gameplay at its heart. Pax Dei is the game we’ve been dreaming of making for longer than we care to remember. We can’t wait to see how players will engage with our world, and watch as their stories come to life.

We’re hard at work developing Pax Dei, and we can’t wait to share it with you! Stay up-to-date on our progress, upcoming playtests, and more:

❖ Sign-up on https://playPaxDei.com
❖ Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1995520/Pax_Dei/
❖ Join the community on Discord: https://discord.gg/paxdei
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
#playPaxDei

You can also find us on...
❖ Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayPaxDei
❖ Instagram: https://instagram.com/playpaxdei/
